caption: Delicious, real, home-made food. We tried the kabobs and they were great. Can’t wait to try other things off the menu.Welcome to the neighborhood!
Great Marrakesh food, perfect with wine!!! I highly recomendé the Lamb.

Amazing food with wonderful service! This restaurant is family-owned and all of the food was made fresh to eat. It was a much welcome reminder of my trip to Morocco a few years back. The owner was very friendly and came out to speak with us personally. I highly recommend this place if you are interested in some wonderful Moroccan food!

Amazing, authentic food with quality people! Will definitely come back for the delicious food, the mint tea, the atmosphere, as well as the hospitality. Come try this place if you’re in the neighborhood 😋
Amazing!  Had couscous and tagine.  Friendly place. Will definitely be back.  Welcome to the neighborhood!
Food is delicious ,  adam and simon did a great job great experience will definitely come back

Best Moroccan food in town. The food was tasty and the atmosphere was great. Adam was great waiter and very helpful on choosing what to eat. The chicken Tagine with fries was very very tasty. This restaurant is very high in my list I will go back again

I absolutely loved it here! Big shout outs to Adam and Simon for making date night such a special time. “Look for tea 4011”!!!!! Cannot wait to go back - if only for the hummus. This will definitely be in our weekly rotation.

Fantastic service!  Independently run restaurant.  I am eager to return!  I had the Chicken Tagine, and my date ordered the Lamb Kabob.  Many of the ingredients are imported directly from Morocco, and the owner (Simon) even showed off some after dinner tea with the "made in Morocco" logo.  Everything was awesome, and it takes real guts to open a restaurant in a Pandemic.  This location is on Chicago Ave in the former Havana Libre space.  I hope they have many prosperous years at this new location.  The space is spread out as nice as possible with safety precautions.  Everything is done with safety in mind, but the real reason to go is the fantastic food and service!  It was my first night at a restaurant in a few months, and this experience really WOWED us.
Mmmm delicious chicken pastilla and soup thank you for the food

Just tried this place on a whim and it far exceeded my expectations! We are vegan and we were able to get quite a variety of delicious food here at an affordable price. Our takeout order did not come quickly but it’s clear they make everything carefully from scratch. Well worth the wait! Really glad to see this restaurant add some much needed variety to the neighborhood. (No offense to all the Thai and Mexican places, but we need some culinary diversity on Chicago Ave!) We’ll be back at Marrakesh soon enough.

Such an amazing addition to the neighborhood! Very friendly management and delicious food. We ordered the eggplant dip (Zalook), chicken pastilla, hummus, beef kefta with couscous, lamb shank tagine and chicken marrakech tagine. Everything was great but we thought the pastilla (SO interesting, sweet/savory dish that you must try at least once), lamb shank tagine and kefta were standouts. Look forward to trying the falafal next time.

“Marrakech Deal” was an amazing app to start out with especially if you’re new to Moroccan food like me... great way to try everything. Tagine was incredibly tasty as well. Glad to have a new restaurant in the neighborhood!
Tried the Kefta kebob. The Kefta was delicious. The sides were my favorite part! A big portion of meat over couscous with four veggie sides that I cannot make myself. I will be back!
Tried the lamb tagine, appetizer sampler, soup and hummus.  Everything was delicious!! Will definitely be dining here again!

Got the chicken tagine with veggies, chicken cous cous, carrots, chicken pastilla and baklava.  Everything was delicious!  Both chicken entrees were 🤤🤤🤤. I think they will have some growing pains as a new restaurant, but there were a bunch of people who ordered so fingers crossed!  We’ll be back again!  Welcome to the neighborhood!
